description_html: Expertly carved from a single block of Limestone or Marquina Taupe, Stone Forest’s Calma bathtub provides a gentle oval-shaped elegant respite. The soft lines of this freestanding tub combine a simple yet sophisticated design. The muted and soft colors belie the craftsmanship involved in creating this sensual tub. The sculptural quality of the beautiful stone creates an exquisite piece of art which becomes the focus piece of any bath.
